thread.title: Alison

author: Alison
title: Alison
text: I recently joined Trusted Housesitters and experince so far is very good. My very first was looking after a young cat recovering from a broken leg. Theowner immediately put me at ease on my arrival and showed me around her lovely apartment. Her cat was still at the vets but collected the next day. H had a lovely btemperamnet and was very easy to give medication and look after. I found time to also explore the nearby canal and take walks in the lovely surrounding countryside. Would highly recommend.
